terms_landing.headertext: These terms and conditions ("terms") apply to the Ohio Natural Gas ("ONG") Refer-a-Friend program ("RAF Program" or "Program"). Referrers must click "Agree" to the RAF Program terms to participate in the RAF Program. Referees agree to the RAF Program terms by using an RAF Program Referral Code when enrolling with ONG.
terms_landing.heading: Overview
terms_landing.termslist: [{"termstitle":"Rewards and Eligibility"\,"termsdescription":"The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG."},{"termstitle":"Program Enrollment; Referral Code"\,"termsdescription":"The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG."},{"termstitle":"Card and Promotional Fulfillment"\,"termsdescription":"The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG."},{"termstitle":"Limits"\,"termsdescription":"The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG."},{"termstitle":"General Provisions"\,"termsdescription":"The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG."}]
